meanings.meaning_en_US: A three-dimensional representation of a person or thing, or of a proposed structure, typically on a smaller scale.

examples.sentence: He built a [model] of the solar system.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他製作了一個太陽系的模型

examples.sentence: They presented a [model] of the new building.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們展示了新建築的模型

examples.sentence: The architect showed a [model] of his design.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 建築師展示了他的設計模型

meanings.meaning_en_US: Economic activity concerned with the processing of raw materials and manufacture of goods in factories.

examples.sentence: The automotive [industry] has seen significant growth.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 汽車工業已經看到了顯著增長。

examples.sentence: She works in the tech [industry] as a software engineer.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在科技工業擔任軟體工程師。

examples.sentence: The changes in the [industry] will impact the economy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 行業的變化將影響經濟。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A member of the species Homo sapiens, distinguished from other animals.

examples.sentence: Every [human] has the right to live freely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人類都有權自由生活。

examples.sentence: Humans are known for their ability to create.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 人類因其創造能力而聞名。

examples.sentence: The study focused on [human] behavior.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這項研究集中於人類行為。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Of a more excellent or effective type or quality.

examples.sentence: This method is [better] than the previous one.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種方法比之前的更好

examples.sentence: I feel [better] today than yesterday.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我今天感覺比昨天好多了

examples.sentence: She is a [better] player than her brother.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的技術比她的兄弟更好

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the science of medicine.

examples.sentence: She is studying [medical] science at university.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在大學學習醫學科學。

examples.sentence: He works in a [medical] research facility.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在一個醫學研究機構工作。

examples.sentence: The report provides valuable [medical] insights.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這份報告提供了有價值的醫學見解。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having all parts or elements; whole.

examples.sentence: The report is [complete] and ready to submit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告已經完整，準備提交

examples.sentence: She gave a [complete] answer to the question.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對問題給出了完整的回答

examples.sentence: A [complete] meal includes proteins, carbs, and vegetables.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一頓完整的餐點包括蛋白質、碳水化合物和蔬菜

meanings.meaning_en_US: In opposition to.

examples.sentence: She stood [against] the wall.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她靠在牆上。

examples.sentence: They campaigned [against] the new law.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對新法律進行了反對運動。

examples.sentence: He spoke [against] injustice.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他發言反對不公正。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A level of quality or attainment.

examples.sentence: This product meets industry [standard].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這一產品達到了行業標準。

examples.sentence: A good [standard] of living is important for happiness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 良好的生活標準對幸福感很重要。

examples.sentence: The school follows strict educational [standards].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 學校遵循嚴格的教育標準。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A compulsory financial charge or levy imposed by a government.

examples.sentence: You need to pay your [tax] by April 15.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要在4月15日之前繳納稅款

examples.sentence: The income [tax] affects most workers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 所得稅影響到大多數工作者

examples.sentence: He's worried about the new [tax] laws.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對新的稅收法規感到擔憂

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to the law.

examples.sentence: She sought [legal] advice before signing the contract.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在簽署合約前，她尋求法律建議

examples.sentence: The [legal] age for drinking varies by country.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 飲酒的法定年齡因國家而異

examples.sentence: They provided [legal] support to those in need.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們為需要幫助的人提供法律支持

meanings.meaning_en_US: Having happened, begun, or been made not long ago.

examples.sentence: I read a [recent] article about climate change.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我閱讀了一篇關於氣候變化的最近的文章。

examples.sentence: Have you seen any [recent] movies?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有看過最近的電影嗎？

examples.sentence: The [recent] events have sparked a lot of discussions.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 最近的事件引發了很多討論。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.

examples.sentence: Her [memory] of the event was vivid.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她對那個事件的記憶非常清晰

examples.sentence: He has a good [memory] for names.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對名字的記憶力很好

examples.sentence: The [memory] of her childhood brings her joy.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她童年的記憶讓她感到快樂

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to society or its organization.

examples.sentence: She has a very [social] personality.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一個非常外向的人

examples.sentence: The project aims to enhance [social] awareness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目旨在提高社會意識

examples.sentence: He enjoys [social] gatherings with friends.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他喜歡和朋友的社交聚會

meanings.meaning_en_US: To bring something into existence.

examples.sentence: She wants to [create] a beautiful painting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想創造一幅美麗的畫作。

examples.sentence: They decided to [create] a new website.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們決定創建一個新網站。

examples.sentence: The artist hopes to [create] lasting memories.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位藝術家希望創造持久的記憶。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being in the early stage of life, development, or growth.

examples.sentence: She is a [young] artist with great talent.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她是一位擁有巨大才華的年輕藝術家

examples.sentence: The [young] trees need plenty of water.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 年輕的樹木需要大量的水

examples.sentence: We must protect the [young] generation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們必須保護年輕一代

meanings.meaning_en_US: An area of open land, especially one planted with crops or pasture, typically bounded by hedges or fences.

examples.sentence: The cows are grazing in the [field].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 牛在田野裡吃草。

examples.sentence: They walked through the [field] of flowers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們走過了花田。

examples.sentence: The vast [field] stretched out before them.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 廣闊的田野在他們面前展開。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Only one; not one of several.

examples.sentence: She wants a [single] ticket to the concert.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她想要一張單一的演唱會票。

examples.sentence: He is the [single] winner of the contest.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是比賽的單一贏家。

examples.sentence: A [single] thought crossed her mind.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 一個單一的想法閃過她的腦袋。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A secret word or phrase used to gain access to a system.

examples.sentence: Please enter your [password] to log in.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請輸入您的密碼以登錄

examples.sentence: Make sure your [password] is strong.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保您的密碼強而有力

examples.sentence: He forgot his [password] and couldn't access his account.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他忘記了密碼，無法訪問他的賬戶

meanings.meaning_en_US: Most recent in time; the newest.

examples.sentence: This is the [latest] version of the software.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這是軟體的最新版本。

examples.sentence: Have you heard the [latest] news?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有聽到最新的消息嗎？

examples.sentence: She always wears the [latest] fashion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是穿著最新的時尚。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The area of variation between upper and lower limits on a particular dimension.

examples.sentence: The temperature can vary within a large [range].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 溫度可以在一個大的範圍內變化。

examples.sentence: Please select a [range] of options to choose from.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請選擇一系列選項來進行選擇。

examples.sentence: The service covers a [range] of locations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該服務涵蓋多個地點。
